text: Fukuyama may refer to: ==People== * Francis Fukuyama, Japanese-American philosopher and political economist * Fukuyama (surname), other people with the name ==Places== *Fukuyama, Hiroshima, city in Japan *Fukuyama, Kagoshima, former town in Japan, now part of Kirishima city *Fukuyama, Japanese word for Mount Fuji, meaning "mountain of wind" ==Other uses== *Fukuyama congenital muscular dystrophy (FCMD)
title: Fukuyama
